title: ??? 10 V 10 ???
body:
I would love to see a 10 v 10 map if possible because I always have way more friends then a normal lobby can hold and have to priorities who to play with first and I never have any more then 10 or so wanting to play and it would make it easier for us social players with tons of friends.
Just give it some thought if you read this I think it would be a great idea.

replies.body: No. If anything was discovered with Hexakill, it's that extra people just make the game last longer. 6 people made games go for on average 15 minutes longer. With 10 people it would just make never ending games.
Veigar and nas would have to become 6300 champs lol.
Well 10 people, 10 lanes? 1 for each lane? or 5 lanes? 2 each lane? Well I don't care I just tell all my friends to go to one lane ARAM STYLE 10 V 10
